about_the_game:
The boy, who was about to celebrate Thanksgiving Day with his family, finds himself stuck in a house with a dangerous stranger who seems to be responsible for his parent's disappearance.

A bleak, cold, and dark night was certainly the perfect setting for the sinister events, that you will be forced to witness for yourself!

Run, Hide, Solve Survive!

Features:

- An incredible voice cast including Doug Cockle (Geralt from the Witcher series), Sandy Johnson (1978's Halloween), Christopher Murray (twin peaks, parks and rec), CinnamonToastKen (Professional Youtuber) & many more!

- The choice to play the game with classic fixed camera angles or you can play entirely in first-person!

- Randomly located puzzle solutions, so it feels fresh each time you play!

- Hiding Mechanics! Players can hide from Killgrim in closets, under beds, in bushes and more! But don't hide too long as Killgrim will eventually find you!

- An Ai That Hunts! - Our Gigantic Murderer known as "Killgrim", Thinks, Hears and Hunts! Don't hide for too long, only run when you need to and be careful of the doors.... Killgrim is coming.

- Health Items and Combining! Like good old classic survival horrors, you can combine health items to make greater items, in this case you can combine peanut butter and jam... Guess what it makes?

- TANK CONTROLS! Nothing makes an intense situation worse than tank controls!

- BONUS post game unlockable content & modes!

content_descriptors.notes:
All gore and violence is based on low poly graphic games, with some humour added in parts.

There is no nudity or sexual content.

short_description: In this homage to 90's Survival Horror Games and Cinema, you play as a young boy visiting his grandparent's turkey farm for Thanksgiving. When all is not what it seems, as one by one, each family member is murdered by a giant unknown Killer. Run, Hide, Solve Survive!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Serbian
*languages with full audio support
